CustomField.formula: IF ( BLANKVALUE(DestinationNbrDays__c,0)>0, CASE(TEXT(Destination__c) ,"Paychex","Inbound" ,"Oasis","Inbound-Oasis" ,"Flock","Inbound-Flock" ,"Benetrac","Inbound-Benetrac" ,"Rework","Inbound-Rework" ,"Exhausted","Inbound-Exhausted" ,"Recycle","Inbound-Recycle" ,"INB-SOAR","INB-SOAR" ,"Speed to Lead","Inbound-STL" ,"Stalled Opps","Inbound-Stalled" ,"") ,"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If an opportunity is created off a referral that is connection to a campaign with a value in this field, then it will use this Marketing Source on the Opportunity.
CustomField.label: Opp NSS Source
